Key Arguments: The proposed ACMA powers are unnecessary because past instances labeled as misinformation have been proven true.
Censorship of free speech is dangerous and reminiscent of authoritarian regimes.
Free expression allows truth to emerge naturally, especially in scientific discourse.
The Covid-19 vaccine mandates were an example of misinformation being used to suppress dissenting opinions.
Censorship could be used by the government to suppress opposition and control narratives.
Notable Quotes: The people who try and censor free speech are never the good guys.
This just proves why we cannot have censorship on free speech.
I do not believe that for one moment and it seems to be a power grab by the government.
